reviewText: The tape, with Benny Parson hosting, is a must have for Waltrip fans. This informal interview takes place at Darrell's farm. DW proves he is still the "master storyteller" with this one. He recounts his early years  in racing and how he got started. His brother Michael is no less  entertaining. Michael tells of is beginnings with the Petty families and  how they guided him in racing. The brothers also discuss those two horrible  crashes in which most thought would have been fatal. It is a must have  video to have for Waltrip fans. DW you will be missed!
